main.name: AbdulWahid

main.bio: To work in a firm with a professional work driven environment where I can utilize and apply my knowledge, skills and enhance my experience through continuous learning which would enable me as a fresh graduate to grow while fulfilling organizational goals.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact no restrictions. Availabe on the receiver side anytime.

testimonials.text: AbdulWahid is be one of the most brilliant developer I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
